name: Calabrese Broccoli
description: Fresh Calabrese broccoli, rich in vitamins and fiber. Perfect for healthy meals and salads. Grown organically for maximum nutrition and taste. Try it steamed, roasted, or raw for a crunchy snack.

name: Banana
description: Sweet organic bananas, full of potassium and energy. Great for snacks, smoothies, or baking. A favorite for kids and adults alike!

name: White Hazelnut
description: Delicate white hazelnuts, perfect for baking or healthy snacking. Enjoy their subtle flavor and crunch in your favorite recipes or as a nutritious snack on the go.

name: Tomato
description: Juicy organic tomatoes, ideal for salads, sauces, and sandwiches. Sun-ripened for maximum flavor and freshness.

name: Mung Bean
description: Nutritious mung beans, high in protein and fiber. Great for soups, curries, and healthy sprouts. A staple in many Asian cuisines.

name: Brown Hazelnut
description: Crunchy brown hazelnuts, a tasty and healthy snack for any time of day. Add them to your granola, desserts, or enjoy straight from the bag.

name: Eggs
description: Farm-fresh organic eggs, rich in protein and essential nutrients. Perfect for breakfast, baking, or any meal. Taste the difference of free-range quality!

name: Rusk
description: Crispy bakery rusks, perfect for breakfast or as a crunchy snack. Enjoy with tea, coffee, or as a base for creative appetizers.

name: Fresh
description: Fresh organic produce, handpicked for quality and taste. Experience the vibrant flavors and natural goodness in every bite.

name: Organic Almonds
description: Premium organic almonds, perfect for healthy snacking or baking. Packed with protein, fiber, and healthy fats. Enjoy them raw, roasted, or in your favorite recipes.

name: Cabbage
description: Crisp green cabbage, great for salads, slaws, and stir-fries. A classic ingredient for coleslaw and fermented dishes like sauerkraut.

name: Bean
description: Tender green beans, full of flavor and nutrients. Steam, sauté, or roast for a delicious side dish.

name: Hazelnut
description: Classic hazelnuts, delicious in desserts or as a wholesome snack. Try them in chocolate spreads, pastries, or enjoy on their own.

name: Nuts
description: A mix of premium organic nuts for a nutritious and satisfying snack. Perfect for sharing, parties, or a quick energy boost during the day.

name: Onion
description: Fresh organic onions, essential for adding flavor to any dish. Mild and sweet, they are perfect for salads, soups, and sautés.
